CALL PURPOSE: Assistance with PCR portal on email

BUSINESS CONTEXT.Current challenges/pain points: Issue with PCR portal on email, unable to access it in Outlook

resolution_steps_taken: Conducted screen share to diagnose issue

RELATIONSHIP_HEALTH.Overall_satisfaction_indicators: High, as the customer expressed gratitude and satisfaction at the resolution.
RELATIONSHIP_HEALTH.Trust_level_signals: Moderate to high, as the customer followed the instructions and allowed remote control.
RELATIONSHIP_HEALTH.Communication_style: Patient and guided, with the support agent leading the customer through the process.
RELATIONSHIP_HEALTH.Rapport_quality: Good, with polite exchanges and a friendly closure.

CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Onboarding_status: Completed, as the customer is already using the product but needed technical support.
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Product_adoption_level: Intermediate, as the customer uses key features but struggles with updates and technical issues.
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Feature_utilization: Moderate, needed assistance to restore and update features.
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Expansion_opportunities: Possible, if further education on product features and updates is provided.

RETENTION_FACTORS.Risk_indicators: Potential technical difficulties with updates could frustrate the customer.
RETENTION_FACTORS.Loyalty_signals: Customer's willingness to follow instructions and satisfaction with the service.
RETENTION_FACTORS.Advocacy_potential: Moderate, likely to recommend based on support experience but may have reservations about technical issues.

COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Preferred_contact_methods: Phone and screen sharing for real-time problem resolution.
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Response_time_expectations: Immediate, as the customer required real-time assistance.
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Information_style_preferences: Step-by-step guidance through visual and verbal instructions.
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Decision-making_patterns: Relies on expert guidance, prefers hands-on assistance.
